name: 3D Playground (jwiebbelling)
description:
A school project I made to show in a fun and interactive way, 5 projects that were made by me during the year. All of the 5 projects represented an important value, such as: fun, growth, individuality, self confidence and pride.

I tried to think out of the box and avoid the generic, embracing the "crazy"/funny side of me and making this project way more personal than I thought it would be. 

The result was a big playground with 5 different areas (one for each project), and a lot of small details that represent a bit of my progress through this year. The playground can also be seen as a gallery/museum of my previous projects.
